member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument
member.summary: Encapsulates a PDF document and allows PDF pages, objects, and images to be read.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new PDFDocument from a specified stream containing a PDF file.
member.param: The stream containing an existing PDF file. This cannot be **null** and must support reading and seeking.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new PDFDocument from the specified stream containing a PDF file and (optional) password.
member.param: The stream containing an existing PDF file. This cannot be **null** and must support reading and seeking.
The password to use if stream contains an encrypted PDF file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new PDFDocument from a specified PDF file.
member.param: The name of an existing PDF file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new PDFDocument form a specified PDF file and optional password.
member.param: The name of an existing PDF file.
The password to use if fileName contains an encrypted PDF file; otherwise, this parameter is not used.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.DecodeImage(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the specified PDF image object embedded in this PDFDocument.
member.param: String that specifies the PDF image object number to decode.
member.returns: A Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetContentType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the content type for the specified page of this PDFDocument.
member.param: The page number to check.
member.returns: A PDFContentType that indicates the content type for the specified page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetDigitalSignatureSupportStatus
member.summary: Gets the status of digital signature support in the LEADTOOLS PDF toolkit.
member.returns: A RasterExceptionCode that indicates the status of digital signature support in the LEADTOOLS PDF toolkit. A value of RasterExceptionCode.Success indicates that digital signature support is available and ready to use. Any other value indicates that either the required libraries are missing, or digital signature support is not available for this platform.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetEmbeddedFileSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to find the schema of an embedded file.
member.param: Schema key to find.
member.returns: The matching schema if found; otherwise, **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetImageRect(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,Leadtools.Pdf.PDFRect)
member.summary: Creates an image from a PDF document page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetPageImage(Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a raster image of a page in the PDF file associated with this PDFDocument.
member.param: An optional Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs to use when reading the page. If you pass a **null** reference, then this method will internal create a new Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs object and dispose before it returns.

The 1-based page number to read. Must be greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to the total number of pages in the document (Pages.Count). Use the special value of -1 to represent the last page in the document.
member.returns: A Leadtools.RasterImage that represents the rendering of the requested page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetPageRasterizer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a PDFPageRasterizer object for the specified page.
member.returns: PDFPageRasterizer object for the specified page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetPageSvg(System.Int32,Leadtools.Codecs.CodecsLoadSvgOptions)
member.summary: Gets the specified page as an SVG document.
member.param: 1-based number of the page.
Options to use when converting the PDF data to SVG. This parameter can be **null** to use the default options.
member.returns: The Leadtools.ISvgDocument for the specified page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetPageSvg(Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs,System.Int32,Leadtools.Codecs.CodecsLoadSvgOptions)
member.summary: Gets a SVG document representation of a page in the PDF file associated with this PDFDocument.
member.param: An optional Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs to use when reading the page. If you pass a **null** reference, then this method will internally create a new Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs object and dispose of it before returning.

The 1-based page number to read. Must be greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to the total number of pages in the document (Pages.Count). Use the special value of -1 to indicate a reference to the last page of the document.
Options to use when loading the SVG.
member.returns: An Leadtools.ISvgDocument that represents the requested page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.GetThumbnail(Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail of a page in the PDF file associated with this PDFDocument.
member.param: An optional Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs to use when reading the page. If you pass a **null** reference, then this method will internally create a new Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs object and dispose before it returns.

The 1-based page number. Must be greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to the total number of pages in the document (Pages.Count). Use the special value of -1 to represent the last page in the document.
The desired maximum width of the thumbnail image in pixels. Must be greater than 32.
The desired maximum height of the thumbnail image in pixels. Must be greater than 32.
member.returns: A new Leadtools.RasterImage that is the thumbnail image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.ParseDocumentStructure(Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions)
member.summary: Parses the Table of Content and internal links or jumps between the pages of the PDF file associated with this PDFDocument.
member.param: Document structure parsing options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFDocument.ParsePages(Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses objects such as text items (characters), images, rectangles, annotations, form fields, digital signatures, hyperlinks and fonts from one or more PDF pages.
member.param: One or more PDFParsePagesOptions enumeration member that specify the types of objects to parse.
1-based index of the first page number to parse. Must be greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to the number of pages in the document.

1-based index of the last page number to parse. Must be greater than or equal to \firstPageNumber\ and less than or equal to the number of pages in the document. Use the special value of -1 to represent the last page in the document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFFile.IsLinearized(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the PDF in a stream is linearized (optimized for the web).
member.param: Stream containing the PDF file data.
The password to use when loading this PDF file (if the file is encrypted); otherwise, use **null**.
member.returns: A linearized PDF file is a file that has been organized in such a way as to enable efficient, incremental access in a network environment. Linearized PDF files allow the first page of the PDF file to be displayed in a user Web browser before the entire file is downloaded from the Web server.

member.summary: Enables or disables fit in window.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions
member.summary: The PDFOptimizerOptions class provides options for controlling the PDFFile optimizer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new PDFOptimizerOptions object with default values.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this PDFOptimizerOptions object.
member.returns: The PDFOptimizerOptions cone this method creates, cast as an object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.AutoOptimizerMode
member.summary: Optimizer mode, which controls the file size and quality.
member.value: A PDFAutoOptimizerMode value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.ColorImageCompression
member.summary: Compression format to use when saving a color image.
member.value: The Leadtools.RasterImageFormat to use. Possible values: SupportedColorImageFormats.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.ColorImageDownsampleFactor
member.summary: Downsample threshold for color images.
member.value: This is the ratio of image resolution to output resolution above which downsampling may be performed. Must be between 1.0 through 10.0, inclusive.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.ColorImageDownsamplingMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode for color images.
member.value: A PDFDownsamplingMode value to use for downsampling. Default is Average

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.ColorImageDPI
member.summary: DPI to use when saving a color image.
member.value: Specifies the resolution to which downsampled color images are reduced. This should be always less than original image resolution. Default is 150.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.EmbedAllFonts
member.summary: Enables or disables font embedding in the output PDF file.
member.value: If **true**, specifies that all fonts are to be embedded in the PDF file, default **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.GrayImageCompression
member.summary: Compression format to use when saving a grayscale image.
member.value: The Leadtools.RasterImageFormat to use. Possible values: SupportedGrayImageFormats.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.GrayImageDownsampleFactor
member.summary: Scale factor to use for resizing when saving a grayscale image.
member.value: This is the ratio of image resolution to output resolution above which downsampling may be performed. Must be between 1.0 through 10.0, inclusive.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.GrayImageDownsamplingMode
member.summary: Downsampling mode to use for resizing when saving a grayscale image.
member.value: A PDFDownsamplingMode value to use for downsampling. Default is Average

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.GrayImageDPI
member.summary: DPI to use when saving a grayscale image.
member.value: Specifies the resolution to which downsampled grayscale images are reduced. This should be always less than original image resolution. Default is 150.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.MonoImageCompression
member.summary: Compression format to use when saving a monochrome image.
member.value: The Leadtools.RasterImageFormat to use. Possible values: SupportedMonoImageFormats.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFOptimizerOptions.MonoImageDownsampleFactor
member.summary: Scale factor to use for resizing when saving a monochrome image.
member.value: This is the ratio of image resolution to output resolution above which downsampling may be performed. Must be between 1.0 through 10.0, inclusive.

member.summary: Downsampling mode to use for resizing when saving a monochrome image.

member.summary: DPI to use when saving a monochrome image.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions
member.summary: PDF encryption options

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PDFSecurityOptions class with default values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this PDFSecurityOptions object.
member.returns: The PDFSecurityOptions clone this method creates, cast as an object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.AnnotationsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether annotations and comments can be added to the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add annotations and comments to the PDF document; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.AssemblyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether pages can be added or removed from the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add or remove pages from the PDF document; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.CopyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the PDF document has copy text access rights.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to copy text from the PDF document; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.CopyForAccessibilityEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether text in the PDF document should be accessible for screen reader software.
member.value: **true** if text in the PDF document should be accessible for screen reader software; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.EditEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the PDF document can be edited.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to edit the PDF document; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.EncryptionMode
member.summary: Indicates the encryption mode to use when updating or creating a PDF document.
member.value: An PDFEncryptionMode enumeration member that specifies the encryption mode to use when updating or creating a PDF document. The default value is PDFEncryptionMode.RC40Bit.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.FormFieldFillingEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the software can fill any form fields in the PDF document.
member.value: **true** if the software can fill any form fields in the PDF document; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.HighQualityPrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the PDF document has high quality (faithful) printing owner access rights.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to print in high quality (faithful); otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.OwnerPassword
member.summary: Owner password to use when encrypting a PDF file.
member.value: A System.String that contains the owner password to use when encrypting a PDF file. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.PrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the PDF document has printing owner access rights.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to print the PDF document; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFSecurityOptions.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password to use when encrypting a PDF file.
member.value: A System.String that contain the user password to use when encrypting a PDF file. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions
member.summary: Specifies options to use when parsing a PDF document structure.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.None
member.summary: Do not parse anything.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.Bookmarks
member.summary: Parse the bookmarks that constitute the document's Table of Contents (TOC). This option populates the PDFDocument.Bookmarks property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.InternalLinks
member.summary: Parse the internal links (or jumps) between the pages found in the document. This option populates the PDFDocument.InternalLinks property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.Images
member.summary: Parse the images found in the document. This option populates the PDFDocument.Images property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.Fonts
member.summary: Parse the fonts found in the document. This option populates the PDFDocument.Fonts property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.All
member.summary: Parse bookmarks, internal links, images, fonts and embedded files.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.EmbeddedFiles
member.summary: Parse embedded files.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions
member.summary: Specifies which options to use when parsing the objects of a PDF document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.None
member.summary: Do not parse any items.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.Objects
member.summary: Parse the objects of the page such as text items (characters), images, and rectangles. Specifying this member will populate the PDFDocumentPage.Objects collection with the objects found in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.Hyperlinks
member.summary: Parse the hyperlinks found in the page. Specifying this member will populate the PDFDocumentPage.Hyperlinks collection with the hyperlinks found in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.IgnoreWhiteSpaces
member.summary: Must be OR'ed with Objects (otherwise it will be ignored). If specified, white space characters such as spaces or tab characters or will not be returned as items in the PDFDocumentPage.Objects collection. Use PDFTextProperties.IsEndOfWord and PDFTextProperties.IsEndOfLine to re-construct the page words and lines as needed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.Annotations
member.summary: Parse the annotations found in the page. Specifying this member will populate the PDFDocumentPage.Annotations collection with any annotations found in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.RTLOriginal
member.summary: Parse characters right to left as they are stored in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.RTLFlipBrackets
member.summary: Flip bracket characters for right to left text when parsing the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.InternalLinks
member.summary: Parse all internal links found in the page. This is the equivalent of calling PDFDocument.ParseDocumentStructure with the PDFParseDocumentStructureOptions.InternalLinks option.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.FormFields
member.summary: Parse the form fields found in the page. Specifying this member will populate the PDFDocumentPage.FormFields collection with the PDF form fields found in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.Signatures
member.summary: Parse the digital signatures found in the page. Specifying this member will populate the PDFDocumentPage.Signatures collection with the PDF digital signatures found in the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.All
member.summary: Parse all objects with white spaces.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Pdf.PDFParsePagesOptions.AllIgnoreWhiteSpaces
member.summary: Parse all objects without white spaces.
